name: Plenna Holding Limited
description: Provider of health care services intended to provide comprehensive in-person and virtual care to middle-income women in Mexico. The company offers services related to gynecology, psychology, nutrition, laboratories and tests, vaccines and general medicine, enabling women to make timely and informed decisions about their sexual and reproductive life.
one_liner: Provider of health care services intended to provide comprehensive in-person and virtual care to middle-income women in Mexico. The company offers services related to gynecology, psychology, nutrition, laboratories and tests, vaccines and general medicine, enabling women to make timely and informed decisions about their sexual and reproductive life.
